# albumType

**Instance Property**

The type of photo album.

## Declaration

```swift
var albumType: some AssistantSchemas.Enum { get }
```

## Overview

Use Swift macros that generate additional properties and add protocol conformance for your app enum implementation. The following example shows an app enum that conforms to the `.photos.albumType` schema:

```swift
@AppEnum(schema: .photos.albumType)
enum PhotoAlbumType: AppEnum {
    case custom

    static var caseDisplayRepresentations: [PhotoAlbumType: AppIntents.DisplayRepresentation] = [
        .custom: "Custom",
    ]
}
```

For more information about the `.photos` app intent domain, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Making-photo-and-video-actions-available-to-siri-and-apple-intelligence]. For general information about app intent domains, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Integrating-actions-with-siri-and-apple-intelligence].
